name: Warrior
description: A barbarian holds a greataxe, The Warrior card embodies physical strength and fighting acumen.

person.upright: A person (perhaps a barbarian, fighter, or monk) who has trained in combat or served in the military.
person.reverse: A bully who uses physical strength to intimidate others.

creatureTrap.upright: A creature with abilities like those of a barbarian, fighter, or monk.
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature that relies on brute strength, or a trap that can be escaped through the application of brute strength.

place.upright: A training yard or fort where warriors learn combat skills.
place.reverse: A harsh environment where only the physically powerful survive.

treasure.upright: A valuable or magical weapon or suit of armor.

situation.upright: A situation that requires and rewards the skilled application of physical force.
situation.reverse: A situation involving bullying or extortion.
